segment.source: This technical reference section includes additional technical documentation about the various features of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1.
segment.target: This technical reference section includes additional technical documentation about the various features of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, and 2.1 SP1.

segment.source: This information is provided to help the administrator better understand UE-V.
segment.target: This information is provided to help the administrator better understand UE-V.

segment.source: Defines how UE-V synchronizes settings between computers and the settings storage location.
segment.target: Defines how UE-V synchronizes settings between computers and the settings storage location.

segment.source: Sync Provider is the default sync method for UE-V 2.0.
segment.target: Sync Provider is the default sync method for UE-V 2.0.

segment.source: This topic provides technical reference information for sync methods, including the Sync Provider.
segment.target: This topic provides technical reference information for sync methods, including the Sync Provider.

segment.source: Defines when the UE-V Agent synchronizes those settings with the settings storage location.
segment.target: Defines when the UE-V Agent synchronizes those settings with the settings storage location.

segment.source: This topic provides technical reference information about when synchronization takes place based upon the sync method deployed.
segment.target: This topic provides technical reference information about when synchronization takes place based upon the sync method deployed.

segment.source: Provides guidance for downloading and enabling the Microsoft-authored UE-V 2.0 settings location template that supports Office 2013 settings synchronization.
segment.target: Provides guidance for downloading and enabling the Microsoft-authored UE-V 2.0 settings location template that supports Office 2013 settings synchronization.

segment.source: Application Template Schema Reference for UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Application Template Schema Reference for UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Details the XML structure of UE-V settings location templates and provides guidance for editing these files.
segment.target: Details the XML structure of UE-V settings location templates and provides guidance for editing these files.

segment.source: Describes features and services that make UE-V more accessible for people with disabilities.
segment.target: Describes features and services that make UE-V more accessible for people with disabilities.

segment.source: Provides a brief overview of accounts, groups, and other security-related considerations for UE-V.
segment.target: Provides a brief overview of accounts, groups, and other security-related considerations for UE-V.

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
